ShipEquipment.Name: Cabin
ShipEquipment.Desc: A small bunk room with a single bed.

ShipEquipment.Name: Bunk Room
ShipEquipment.Desc: A medium-sized bunk room with three beds.

ShipEquipment.Name: Large Bunk Room
ShipEquipment.Desc: A large bunk room with six beds.

ShipEquipment.Name: Armoury
ShipEquipment.Desc: An armoury, where armour and weapons can be fabricated.

ShipEquipment.Name: Workshop
ShipEquipment.Desc: A workshop, where utility items can be fabricated.

ShipEquipment.Name: Medbay
ShipEquipment.Desc: A medical facility, where medical devices can be fabricated.

ShipEquipment.Name: Foundry
ShipEquipment.Desc: A versatile foundry, where armour, weapons and equipment can all be fabricated.

ShipEquipment.Name: Auto Repair
ShipEquipment.Desc: An auto repair facility, that will repair your ship slowly over time

ShipEquipment.Name: Tinkering Chamber
ShipEquipment.Desc: An engineering and medical chamber based on Grey tech.

ShipEquipment.Name: Engineering Bay
ShipEquipment.Desc: An engineering bay for making modifications to existing equipment.

ShipEquipment.Name: Shield Generator
ShipEquipment.Desc: A small shield generator, protecting your ship against damaging weapons.

ShipEquipment.Name: Advanced Shield System
ShipEquipment.Desc: A larger shield generator, protecting your ship against damaging weapons.

ShipEquipment.Name: Surface Scanner
ShipEquipment.Desc: A scanner to search for missions on a planet surface.

ShipEquipment.Name: Colony Builder
ShipEquipment.Desc: A self-replicating robotic device which founds a new colony on a suitable planet or moon. The location must first be cleared of surface anomalies, detected using the Surface Scanner.

ShipEquipment.Name: Terraform Device
ShipEquipment.Desc: A highly advanced colonising device which uses self-replicating nono-robots to prepare an area for colonisation while locally terraforming the target planet, allowing less hospitable planet types to be colonised.

ShipEquipment.Name: Cloud Colony Device
ShipEquipment.Desc: An alien advanced colonising device which extracts elements from the atmosphere, together with local asteroids, to build a self-perpetuating cloud colony in the atmosphere of a gas giant planet.

ShipEquipment.Name: Chameleon Device
ShipEquipment.Desc: A chameleon device, making your ship blend in with the background stars and hence much harder to hit.

ShipEquipment.Name: Cloaking Device
ShipEquipment.Desc: A cloaking device, largely hiding your ship from view by all but the most advanced technology.

ShipEquipment.Name: Silent Drive
ShipEquipment.Desc: A device that helps hide the emissions of your ship's engine while travelling, reducing the risk of hostile interception.

ShipEquipment.Name: Military Computer
ShipEquipment.Desc: An advanced targetting subsystem that increases Ship attack power.

ShipEquipment.Name: AI Module
ShipEquipment.Desc: An AI subsystem that increases utility skills for all soldiers onboard.

ShipEquipment.Name: Psylink Suite
ShipEquipment.Desc: A brain-link system that allows Soldiers left on the ship to monitor missions in progress and gain experience.

ShipEquipment.Name: Fission Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: A fission-based power core.

ShipEquipment.Name: Advanced Fission Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: An advanced fission-based power core.

ShipEquipment.Name: Fusion Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: A fusion-based power core.

ShipEquipment.Name: Advanced Fusion Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: An advanced fusion-based power core.

ShipEquipment.Name: Antimatter Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: A power core based on anti-matter annihilation.

ShipEquipment.Name: Advanced Antimatter Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: An advanced power core based on anti-matter annihilation.

ShipEquipment.Name: Dark Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: A dark-matter-based power core.

ShipEquipment.Name: Advanced Dark Core
ShipEquipment.Desc: An advanced dark-matter-based power core.
